pgmconverter module¶

pgmconverter.convert_to_pgm(fname, dest_folder)[source]¶

This function converts .png images into .pgm images. This is done to easen the reading process for the CNN and to make it more universal.

Parameters: - fname = name of the image to convert - dest_folder = folder path to which the image will be saved

pgmconverter.folder_list = ['db2_3levels_nodenoise', 'db2_3levels_yesdenoise', 'sym2_3levels_nodenoise', 'sym2_3levels_yesdenoise', 'db5_4levels_nodenoise', 'db5_4levels_yesdenoise']¶

For every folder in my list

pgmconverter.general_path = 'C:\\Users\\feder\\Desktop'¶

Here I define the list of folders which contains all the images in the .png format.
